document.full_text: boston did not want to leave the door open for a repeat of last year's collapse against philadelphia and on friday they slammed it shut with a 5-1 victory to sweep their eastern conference semi-final series 4-0.
document.title: bruins slam the door on flyers with series sweep
lines_and_colors: boston did not want to leave the door open for a repeat of last year's collapse against philadelphia and on friday they slammed it shut with a 5-1 victory to sweep their eastern conference semi-final series 4-0.
